title: How Charlie Kirk Ended Up on the Government's “Enemy List”
itunes:title: How Charlie Kirk Ended Up on the Government's “Enemy List”
description:
Over the weekend, a bombshell story broke, and Charlie is heavily involved in it. John Solomon from Just The News discovered a list of government enemies including Charlie, President Trump, James O’Keefe, Sean Hannity, Jack Posobiec, and several other conservative creators, commentators, and politicians that were intentionally censored by the government during 2020–and it continues even now. Charlie and John unpack their ‘hit list,’ how it affected the world of social media, and now Charlie is considering suing the federal government for an abridgment of his First Amendment rights. You do not want to miss this episode of The Charlie Kirk Show.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
